mapper.select: SELECT e.enter_id AS enterId, e.user_id AS userId, u.user_nm AS name, u.moblphon_no AS phone, u.email_adres AS email, u.jssfc_cd AS jssfcCd, e.method_cd AS method, e.status_cd AS status, e.type_cd AS type, e.regist_dt AS registDt, e.end_guest_dt AS endGuestDt, e.guest_nm AS guestNm, e.guest_phone AS guestPhone, e.guest_email AS guestEmail FROM TB_ENTER e LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON e.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY e.regist_dt DESC

SELECT e.enter_id AS enterId, e.user_id AS userId, u.user_nm AS name, u.moblphon_no AS phone, u.email_adres AS email, u.jssfc_cd AS jssfcCd, e.guest_nm AS guestNm, e.guest_phone AS guestPhone, e.guest_email AS guestEmail, e.method_cd AS method, e.status_cd AS status, e.type_cd AS type, e.regist_dt AS registDt, e.end_guest_dt AS endGuestDt FROM tb_enter e LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON e.user_id = u.user_id WHERE e.enter_id = #{enterId}
